message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I believe is very valuable to you.  I'm offering it to you for $10,000.  This price gives you a great deal and allows me to make a good profit.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective.  $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  However, I'm willing to come down to $9,250, as I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value of the product.  Let's meet in the middle!

I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $9,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, but that's the maximum I can offer. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
